name: Rex Banquet
location: Rex Lawn Sharah-e-Sher Shah Suri, Karachi, Pakistan
description: Organizing your wedding should be a pleasant and stress-free experience at " Rex Marriage lawn ". We offers best services for our customers with a variety of services for any events which you want to make incredible /elegant not even wedding, birhtday, official party, non official party etc. Rex Lawn is a unique wedding venue / Shadi Hall situated on the Middle of City Thames in the shadow of Dera. The beautifully new furniture and stage both been decorated in an elegant, contemporary style and offer breathtaking views. So let’s come and make your event more special by REX Weeding lawn.

name: City Lawn
location: D-14 Block-i, Faiz House Bus Stop ,North Nazimabad
description: The karachi Wedding Venue / Shadi Hall THE CITY LAWN has the maximum capacity of 700 guest, conveniently located in North Nazimabad near faiz house bus stop. City Lawn is ideal for weddings, corporate dinners, private dinners and exhibitions. City Lawn is air-conditioned and ideal for all types of summer and winter events.

name: Clifton Banquet
description: if you want to arrange your wedding ceremony in Karachi and want to make it memorable as well, then Clifton Banquet is one of the perfect wedding venues for your wedding. It is located near the most valuable area of Clifton near Teen Talwar, Karachi. Which gives you the opportunity to book the venue according to your range in reasonable price. Clifton banquet halls and lawn have very eye-catching and best suited venues for every type of events with all of the facilities that you desire. It is decorated with beautiful flowers, designed tables with lovely vase on them and also special VIP tables with best waiter’s service. You can also enjoy with fully chilled air conditioned environment of this Banquet. It has very beautiful collection of cutlery crockery and giving you the best buffet arrangements. Clifton Banquets has specially trained male waiters and it also giving you the facility of diesel Generator for backup. No doubt that that this venue is amongst the best wedding banquet hall in the Karachi.
